medical_history.chief_complaint: Non-specific abdominal pain, subjective fevers, chills, and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started at 2 am on the morning of admission. The patient reported periumbilical pain, nausea, and shortness of breath due to anxiety. Denied emesis or chest pain. No previous history of abdominal pain.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and father are living; father has hypertension; mother is healthy; three healthy brothers; no history of premature coronary disease or colon cancer.
